channel.title: 99 mining
channel.description: k im looking to get a 2nd 99 skill eventually and idk what to get. My first 99 was theiving. And I want my 2nd 99 to be a rarer skill, not like fletching/cooking etc. Well so I thought i'd maybe try for 99 mining since that would be much easier/faster then 99 runecrafting. Well i deffintly don't want to powermine because that's so slow and boring.. So I thought maybe i'd mine gold from the crafting guild? i met a 99 miner and she said she got most of her lvls down in grand tree mining spot.. which has coal/iron/gold/addy... And there's a bank close to it.. so idk is there any other good spots to mine?

item.description:
@fat_mustard wrote:

ok

item.title: 99 mining
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Actually, thieving has become quite popular, and if you want a rare skill to 99, agility, smithing, mining, herblaw, or runecrafting. Those would be something to do if you want something unique to 99.

Read full topic

99 thieving wow that a reeally rare skill…almost noone does it now. good job

item.title: 99 mining
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:30, topic:125090”]i dont believe anyone would do this, even if you advertise on forums to give a full invent of iron free i still couldn’t find anyone in my experience.

Also to the maker of this thread: i suggest you take advice from zezima himself (sorry had to mention him) but he does have a good way of training.

Basically just train 1 skill, and dont change to others untill you have finished… just keep only training one skill, because if you keep switching it wastes so much time.-[/quote]

Usually, if you advertise on forums, people won’t do it. Just walk around and find a level 20 in a bank and ask him if he wants to make some easy cash. And just explain to him what he needs to do with notes and such, and he gets to keep half the iron, 100 gp each.

And yea, Zezima’s advice is pretty good, except if you get bored, you may get even less work done. I’ve been level 56 range in Melzar’s Maze for a week or so.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 mining
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:29, topic:125090”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=175292.msg1615583#msg1615583 date=1184957242]
well then dont get anything to 99, to get a skill to 99 it is slow, and it is boring.
Its repetetive clicking so there isnt much entertainment in that.
[/quote]

The optimal solution would be to have a noob to carry your iron to the bank. Maybe split it 50-50. That way, it’s faster than simply dropping iron, and you get some profit while powermining.[/quote]
i dont believe anyone would do this, even if you advertise on forums to give a full invent of iron free i still couldn’t find anyone in my experience.

Also to the maker of this thread: i suggest you take advice from zezima himself (sorry had to mention him) but he does have a good way of training.

Basically just train 1 skill, and dont change to others untill you have finished… just keep only training one skill, because if you keep switching it wastes so much time.-

Read full topic

item.title: 99 mining
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:28, topic:125090”]well then dont get anything to 99, to get a skill to 99 it is slow, and it is boring.
Its repetetive clicking so there isnt much entertainment in that.[/quote]

The optimal solution would be to have a noob to carry your iron to the bank. Maybe split it 50-50. That way, it’s faster than simply dropping iron, and you get some profit while powermining.

item.title: 99 mining
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:24, topic:125090”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=175292.msg1615289#msg1615289 date=1184944922]
Well if you really do want to do 99 mining then take some advice - mine iron at east ardougne (near the legends guild where all the bears are) because the iron will never run out and you should average 50k xp an hour.

  • or -
    mine in the desert mining granite because its very fast and i think if you work hard enough you can get maybe a tad more then 50k xp an hour.
    [/quote]

You talking about powermining?[/quote]
yes ofcourse, if you want 99 mining you are not going to keep the ore unless you want to almost triple the time it takes to get 99

Read full topic
